member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.OpacityMetadataEffect
member.summary: Marks an area of an input image as opaque, which can enable internal rendering optimizations.

remarks.p: Note: this effect doesn't modify the image itself to be opaque. It modifies data associated with the image so the renderer assumes the specified region is opaque.
This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Opacity metadata effect.
